title: BTC Tumbles Below $44K, Bitcoin Miners Drop 10% Boosting ETF 'Sell the News' Calls
description: Bitcoin [BTC] dropped to near $43,000 Friday, a fall of 6% in day-over-day trading, while some bitcoin mining stocks tumbled over 10% extending yesterday's decline after Thursday's highly-anticipated spot bitcoin ETF debut.

title: Bitcoin Plunges on Day Two of ETF Mania as Liquidations Soar
description: The Bitcoin ETF buzz calmed Friday as the leading cryptocurrency dipped down near $43,000. Are traders selling the news after the frenzy?

title: Jim Cramer calls “major top” for Bitcoin a week after praising its growth
description:

title: Genesis to surrender BitLicense, pay $8m fine in NYDFS lawsuit
description: Genesis Global Trading has settled with New York’s Department of Financial Services after the regulator filed a $1 billion lawsuit in October 2023.
